title: Protective Role of Quercetin in Chronic Atrophic Gastritis: Modulation of Gastric Mucosal Integrity via the Transforming Growth Factor-beta1/Smads Signaling Pathway.
abstract: This study aimed to elucidate the protective effects of quercetin (Que) on the gastric mucosa in a rat model of chronic atrophic gastritis (CAG), with emphasis on the regulation of the transforming growth factor-beta1 (TGF-β1)/Smads signaling pathway.
